I live next to this bar and it's made my time here in Barcelona worth living.  I've gotten to know the people in this bar very well.  The bartender (Dan) is a really cool and personable guy and the woman running the bar (Jackie) is a real sweet heart and she really keeps the place alive.  You MUST try their hamburgers, they are just delicious.  They also play live Jazz music here which can bring in a nice crowd.  I've also watched many Barcelona soccer matches here which have made for some very good times.  I would definitely recommend this place any night of the week.  P.S.  Don't forget to hit the late bar (Bagoa) just down the street to cap off your night.  It's a great way to end your night.
